description:
Title: Prison Architect Update 4d
Genre: Indie, Simulation, Strategy
Developer: Introversion Software
Publisher: Introversion Software 
Release Date: 6 Oct, 2015

Crack based on : CODEX ;

System Requirements

Minimum:
OS:XP
Processor:Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
Memory:4 GB RAM
Graphics:Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era)
Hard Drive:300 MB HD space

Patch notes:
In addition to the Update 4 features, we have also implemented some experimental new performance enhancements that should make the game run better on virtually everyone's PC. However there is a chance that some backwards compatibility has been lost as a result. We have made this build available on a branch - you will have to opt into it to try it. Please let us know if this special version works for you, and especially if it gives you problems.

**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Open Prison Architect Update 4d.exe , wait for a bit for the self extractor to open, specify the directory where u want to extract the game folder, open the extracted folder and play.....
OR
Extarct it yourself using 'WinRAR'

Always open the game using run as administrator
